TypeSignature.Value: public sealed class PolicyStatement : System.Security.ISecurityEncodable, System.Security.ISecurityPolicyEncodable
.class public auto ansi serializable sealed beforefieldinit PolicyStatement extends System.Object implements class System.Security.ISecurityEncodable, class System.Security.ISecurityPolicyEncodable
Public NotInheritable Class PolicyStatement Implements ISecurityEncodable, ISecurityPolicyEncodable
public ref class PolicyStatement sealed : System::Security::ISecurityEncodable, System::Security::ISecurityPolicyEncodable

summary.span: 表示 的陳述式，描述以特定辨識項 (Evidence) 集合套用至程式碼的使用權限和其他資訊。

span.span: Represents the statement of a describing the permissions and other information that apply to code with a particular set of evidence.
This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks A授與權限和可能的特殊屬性，程式碼群組的一組所組成。A consists of a set of granted permissions, and possible special attributes for the code group. 原則陳述式通常會用做為傳回值作業。Policy statements are typically used as the return value of a operation on a . ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用成員的類別The following code example shows the use of members of the class [!code-cpp[System.Security.Policy.PolicyStatement_Evt#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Policy.PolicyStatement_Evt/CPP/members.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Security.Policy.PolicyStatement_Evt#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Policy.PolicyStatement_Evt/CS/members.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Security.Policy.PolicyStatement_Evt#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Policy.PolicyStatement_Evt/VB/Form1.vb#1)]

summary.span: 取得 物件的雜湊碼，其適合用於雜湊表這類的雜湊演算法和資料結構。

span.span: Gets a hash code for the object that is suitable for use in hashing algorithms and data structures such as a hash table.

returns.span: 目前 物件的雜湊碼。

span.span: A hash code for the current object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 相同的權限的兩個執行個體的雜湊程式碼可能會不同，因此雜湊程式碼不應比較兩個物件。The hash code for two instances of the same permission might be different, hence a hash code should not be used to compare two objects. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用方法來取得目前的原則陳述式的雜湊碼。The following code example shows how to use the method to get the hash code for the current policy statement. 這個程式碼範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class.
